thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bank Of Ireland Group Names Gavin Kelly As New Retail Ireland CEO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bank Of Ireland Group Names Gavin Kelly As New Retail Ireland CEO

organizations.name: reuters) - bank of ireland group plc

text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Bank Of Ireland Group Plc:
* SAYS GAVIN KELLY NEW RETAIL IRELAND CEO * SAYS LEWIS LOVE (GROUP CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER) HAS INFORMED GROUP OF HIS DECISION TO LEAVE BANK
* ‍APPOINTS GAVIN KELLY AS NEW RETAIL IRELAND CEO​ * MICHAEL TORPEY (CHIEF EXECUTIVE OF CORPORATE AND TREASURY), PETER MORRIS (CHIEF GOVERNANCE & REGULATORY OFFICER) TO RETIRE
* ‍LEWIS LOVE, GROUP CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER, HAS INFORMED GROUP OF HIS DECISION TO LEAVE BANK​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
